entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is present in the scene, holding a tiny golden key and a letter from Professor Dumbledore.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: Goblins are a group of creatures that are present in the scene, one of whom is weighing rubies and another who is named Griphook.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a specific goblin who is called by the other goblin to take Hagrid and Harry down to the vaults.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned in the letter that Hagrid has, which is about the You-Know-What in vault seven hundred and thirteen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is present in the scene, following Griphook towards one of the doors leading off the hall.

relationships.description: Hagrid has a tiny golden key, which he is holding up for the goblin to see.
Hagrid received a letter from Professor Dumbledore about the You-Know-What in vault seven hundred and thirteen.
Griphook is leading Hagrid and Harry towards one of the doors leading off the hall.
